description: Borrowed from French adorable, from adorer +‎ -able, with adorer from Old French aorer, from Latin adōrāre, the present active infinitive of adōrō, which is from ad +‎ ōrō.

adjectives.description: adorable (comparative more adorable, superlative most adorable)

entries.meaning: Befitting of being adored; cute or loveable.
